languages.text: Создаёт область тьмы на 3 хода, в которой значительно затруднены атаки дальнего боя

traits.locale_text: Создаёт область тьмы на 3 хода, в которой значительно затруднены атаки дальнего боя

languages.text: Creates an area of darkness that lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} of ranged weapons are reduced by −50% for creatures in that area and for anyone shooting at them.

traits.locale_text: Creates an area of darkness that lasts for 3 rounds. The {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} of ranged weapons are reduced by −50% for this creature and for anyone shooting at it.

Creates an area of darkness that lasts for 3 rounds. The {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} of ranged weapons are reduced by −50% for this creature and for anyone shooting at it.

Creates an area of darkness that lasts for 3 rounds. The {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} of ranged weapons are reduced by −50% for this creature and for anyone shooting at it.

languages.text: Cоздает область тьмы на 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Для существ в этой области и всех, кто в них стреляет, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}шанс попадания{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шанс критического попадания{/g} дистанционным оружием сокращается на 50%.

traits.locale_text: Cоздает область тьмы на 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Для существ в этой области и всех, кто в них стреляет, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}шанс попадания{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шанс критического попадания{/g} дистанционным оружием сокращается на 50%.

Cоздает область тьмы на 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Для существ в этой области и всех, кто в них стреляет, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}шанс попадания{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шанс критического попадания{/g} дистанционным оружием сокращается на 50%.

languages.text: 3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}持続する暗闇の範囲を作り出す。この周囲にいる生物を対象に、遠距離武器の{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカル率{/g}は攻撃側・被攻撃側ともに-50%低下する。
languages.original_text: Creates an area of darkness that lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} of ranged weapons are reduced by −50% for creatures in that area and for anyone shooting at them.

traits.locale_text: 3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}持続する暗闇の範囲を作り出す。この周囲にいる生物を対象に、遠距離武器の{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカル率{/g}は攻撃側・被攻撃側ともに-50%低下する。

languages.text: Crée une zone de ténèbres qui dure 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Les {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de toucher{/g} et les {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances de coups critiques{/g} des armes à distance sont réduites de −50 % pour les créatures de cette zone et tous ceux qui leur tirent dessus.
languages.original_text: Creates an area of darkness that lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} of ranged weapons are reduced by −50% for creatures in that area and for anyone shooting at them.

traits.locale_text: Crée une zone de ténèbres qui dure 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Les {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de toucher{/g} et les {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances de coups critiques{/g} des armes à distance sont réduites de −50 % pour les créatures de cette zone et tous ceux qui leur tirent dessus.

languages.text: Crea una zona de oscuridad que dura 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. La {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}probabilidad de impacto crítico{/g} de las armas a distancia se reducen un −50 % para las criaturas en la zona y para las que disparen a su interior.
languages.original_text: Creates an area of darkness that lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} of ranged weapons are reduced by −50% for creatures in that area and for anyone shooting at them.

traits.locale_text: Crea una zona de oscuridad que dura 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. La {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}probabilidad de impacto crítico{/g} de las armas a distancia se reducen un −50 % para las criaturas en la zona y para las que disparen a su interior.

languages.text: 创造一片黑暗区域，持续3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。区域内的所有生物，以及所有射击区域内生物的单位，远程武器的{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}均降低50%。
languages.original_text: Creates an area of darkness that lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} of ranged weapons are reduced by −50% for creatures in that area and for anyone shooting at them.

traits.locale_text: 创造一片黑暗区域，持续3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。区域内的所有生物，以及所有射击区域内生物的单位，远程武器的{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}均降低50%。

languages.text: 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} boyunca kalan karanlık bir alan oluşturur. O alandaki yaratıkların ve onlara ateş edenlerin menzilli silahlarla {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılıkları{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş olasılıkları{/g} %50 azalır.

languages.text: Erzeugt einen dunklen Bereich, der 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang andauert. {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}Kritische Trefferchance{/g} von Fernkampfwaffen werden für Kreaturen in diesem Bereich und alle Charaktere, die auf sie schießen, um −50 % reduziert.
